metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5166 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
WebExtensions can use request redirection and a "filterReponseData" filter to bypass host permission settings to redirect network traffic and access content from a host for which they do not have explicit user permission. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 60.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
